thread.title: Arsenal news: Aaron Ramsey admits players have let Arsene Wenger down | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Aaron Ramsey admits players have let Arsene Wenger down | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Aaron Ramsey admits players have let Arsene Wenger down | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 11:26 am Arsene Wenger doesn’t deserve the flack he gets, says Aaron Ramsey (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey has admitted that he and his team-mates have sometimes not done enough for their under-fire manager Arsene Wenger . Jamie Carragher blasts Jurgen Klopp for not fixing Liverpool's one glaring weakness 
The Wales international has long been a key part of the Gunners’ first XI, though he’s had to accept a reduced role this season due to injuries and more competition in the middle of the park. 
Still, speaking about Wenger’s situation amid rumours this could be his final season at the Emirates Stadium, Ramsey was quick to stick up for his boss. Aaron Ramsey says players have let Wenger down (Picture: Getty)
